name: Residential Clothes Washer (EE+DR)
energy_efficiency_source: Determined by custom savings shape information in 'tsv_features'

installed_cost_source.notes: Total installed cost is average of low/high 'ESTAR Connected' values for 'Top-loading' and 'Front-loading' clothes washers

source_data.title: Grid-Interactive Efficient Building Technology Cost, Performance, and Lifetime Characteristics
source_data.author: Nubbe et al. 2020

product_lifetime_source.notes: Average of low/high 'Product Lifetime (yrs.)' values for 'Top-loading' and 'Front-loading' clothes washers

source_data.title: Grid-Interactive Efficient Building Technology Cost, Performance, and Lifetime Characteristics
source_data.author: Nubbe et al. 2020

_description: Clothes washer, upgraded to a high efficiency unit, with DR-responsive operation
